The cytokine profile of these cells demonstrated that <extra_id_0> IFN-gamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> is the predominant cytokine in Th1 cells , <extra_id_0> IL-4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> IL-13 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in Th2 cells , and <extra_id_0> IL-17 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> in Th17 cells ( Akdis et al . , 2000 ; Burgler et al . , 2009 ) .
